name: GridColumnApi
description: The column API interface that is available in the grid apiRef.

properties.name: getAllColumns
properties.description: Returns an array of GridColDef containing all the column definitions.

properties.name: getColumnIndex
properties.description: Returns the index position of a column. By default, only the visible columns are considered. Pass false to useVisibleColumns to consider all columns.

properties.name: getColumnPosition
properties.description: Returns the left-position of a column relative to the inner border of the grid.

properties.name: setColumnIndex
properties.description: Moves a column from its original position to the position given by targetIndexPosition.

properties.name: setColumnVisibility
properties.description: Changes the visibility of the column referred by field.

properties.name: setColumnWidth
properties.description: Updates the width of a column.

properties.name: updateColumn
properties.description: Updates the definition of a column.

properties.name: updateColumns
properties.description: Updates the definition of multiple columns at the same time.
